snippet: A decree published on the Kremlin’s website in the name of President Vladimir V. Putin said that Jones, a 46-year-old American who was once widely regarded as the world’s best boxer, had been given Russian citizenship.
abstract: Former American boxer Roy Jones Jr is granted Russian citizenship by Pres Vladimir V Putin; Jones asked for citizenship to make business travel to Russia easier; other boxing news noted.
lead_paragraph: A decree published on the Kremlin’s website in the name of President Vladimir V. Putin said that Jones, a 46-year-old American who was once widely regarded as the world’s best boxer, had been given Russian citizenship.

headline.main: Russia Gives Roy Jones Jr. Citizenship
